name: Samyang 50mm T1.5
description: Smooth focus gears, ideal for low-light shooting and film-style production.

name: Carl Zeiss Jena DDR MC S (Sonnar) 135mm F3.5 Cine Mod
description: Professionally cine-modded for Arri PL mount, delivering sharp imagery with smooth rendering and rich color contrast.

name: Carl Zeiss Jena DDR Tessar 50mm F2.8 Cine Mod
description: Renowned for its “Eagle Eye” sharpness, precise detail, gentle vintage character, and a uniquely compact form.

name: Canon FD 50mm f/1.4
description: Popular FD prime, sharp stopped down, warm rendering.

name: Joseph Petzval 35 f/2.0
description: Warm veiling glare and gentle lens flares for a dreamy, vintage-inspired atmosphere.

name: LOMO Round-Front 50mm
description: Classic Soviet anamorphic with creamy rendering and oval bokeh.

name: BLAZAR LENS 35mm T1.8 APEX 1.33x
description: Autofocus, crisp widescreen visuals, neutral cinematic flares, and real-time eye-tracking.

name: Asahi Super-Takumar 55mm F1.8 Cine Mod
description: Razor-sharp detail, rich color tones, and smooth bokeh, this cine-modded Takumar blends vintage character with professional cinema handling.

name: Minolta MD 35–70mm f/3.5
description: Reliable vintage zoom with macro function, great entry option.

name: Olympus Zuiko Auto-Zoom 50-90mm f/3.5
description: Sharp telephoto reach, ideal for portraits and creative video.

name: Helios-44-2 FF 2/58
description: 58mm vintage prime with dreamy swirly bokeh.

name: Minolta Rokkor-PG 58mm f/1.2
description: Super-fast vintage prime with creamy bokeh and shallow DOF.

name: TTArtisan 35mm f/1.4 Lens
description: Sonnar optical design, which prioritizes sharpness and low distortion for clear and accurate rendering.
